
# Julia


``` julia
m = rand(0:99, 10, 9)

m1 = m[:, 2] .- 2 .* m[:, 6] .+ 3 .* m[:, 8]

mtrx = hcat(m, m1)

inv_mtrx = inv(mtrx)
```
